conbody.p: Data Collector environmentconfiguringsdc-env.sh fileconfiguringsdcd-env.sh fileconfiguring provides two environment configuration files:

ul.li: $SDC_DIST/libexec/sdc-env.sh - Used when you start manually from the command line.
$SDC_DIST/libexec/sdcd-env.sh - Used when you start as a service.

conbody.p: Use a text editor to edit the appropriate environment configuration file. Some of the environment variables in the sdc-env.sh file are commented out and do not reflect the default values. Be sure to uncomment the line when you change a variable value.
After you edit the file, restart to enable the changes.

Modify the environment configuration files to customize the following areas:
directories
User and group used to start as a service
Java configuration options
Java Security Manager that restricts the runtime permissions of user libraries
Path to jar files to be added to the root classloader
